page.title: 07ROSSWAY FARM ESTATE
page.content: Rossway Farm was built in 1865 and it was bought by the Hadden-Patons in 1867 for 3,000 pounds.It contains 1,000 acres of land and is farmed by Rossway Farms.7 people are employed on the land and they all lodge in farm buildings;11 families live on the estate.The machinery used on the farm is:2 combine-harvesters,6 tractors,and others necessary for arable farming.Wheat and barley are the main crops grown;there is permanent pasture and all this needs lots of fertiliser. The working on the land lasts for 40 hours each week.Tractors are used for about 350 hours a year on overtime.There are two problems with the soil:it is full of flints and there are a lot of slopes.There are 844 acres of crops,about 60 acres of pasture and about 100 acres of woodland.804 acres of cereal are
